text:
This was probably mentioned and requested numerous times, but I would still mention it here again:

Why are we able to setup only one responsible break-point, despite the fact that the array in json is called breakpointS.

Also: there are 3 breakpoints in website page section of HS, but we are not able to specify ours.
Are we talking about the same thing? Im talking about user-input styles based on values from the styles tab
oh nwm but that would be amazing on top of this aswell :slightly_smiling_face:
